statements: SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = '12345';
SELECT game_id, COUNT(*) FROM player_feedback GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT player_id, game_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback ORDER BY player_id, game_id;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT player_id, game_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE rating = 5
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT player_id, game_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id, game_id HAVING feedback_count > 10
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, feedback_text, submission_date FROM feedback ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, player_id, review_text, rating, review_date FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS feedback_count FROM feedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY player_id ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1
SELECT feedback_text, submission_date FROM feedback WHERE player_id = 5 ORDER BY submission_date DESC
SELECT player_id, COUNT(*) AS num_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_reviews > 3
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM reviews
SELECT player_id, review_text, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM PlayerFeedback
SELECT player_name, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback ORDER BY player_name DESC
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE player_name='Alice'
SELECT review_text FROM GameReviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_id ASC
SELECT player_id, game_id, high_score FROM PlayerScores WHERE player_id=123 AND game_id=456
SELECT player_name, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback
SELECT review_text, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE rating > 4
SELECT player_id, player_name, feedback_text FROM PlayerFeedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50
SELECT game_id, review_text, rating FROM GameReviews WHERE rating < 3
SELECT player_id, player_name, game_id, high_score FROM PlayerScores ORDER BY high_score DESC
SELECT * FROM player_feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, date_received FROM player_feedback ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback_count FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_feedback_count > 1;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM player_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_text FROM player_feedback;
SELECT player_id, feedback_id, feedback_text, date_received FROM player_feedback ORDER BY date_received DESC;
SELECT player_id, feedback_id, feedback_text, date_received FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, release_date, developer FROM games WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT developer_name, headquarters_location FROM developers;
SELECT * FROM Player;
SELECT player_name, email FROM Player WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM Game ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Player INNER JOIN Feedback ON Player.player_id = Feedback.player_id WHERE Feedback.game_id = 5;
SELECT developer_name, headquarters FROM Developer WHERE developer_name LIKE '%Studios%';
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM Player WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY player_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM Game WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY game_title ASC;

SELECT player_name, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Player JOIN Feedback ON Player.player_id = Feedback.player_id WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT player_name, review_text, rating FROM Player JOIN Review ON Player.player_id = Review.player_id WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC, player_name ASC;
SELECT developer_name, headquarters FROM Developer WHERE developer_name IN ('ABC Studio', 'XYZ Games') ORDER BY developer_name ASC;
